title: Prepositions of Movement
instructions: Work in pairs of "player A" and "player B" and use a shared phone. Look at whose scoreboard is active and take turns to read the prompts in the middle and click on the correct word as quick as you can. You have 6 seconds to do so. If you don't click while your scoreboard is active, you'll miss the opportunity and your question will be given to your partner to answer. You get extra points for speed if your answer is correct. No points whatsoever for incorrect answers. You can see some feedback on your answers at the end of the game.

prompts: go _____ to have something to eat
push the letter in _____ the door
climb _____ a tree to have some cherries
go _____ to see the ocean from the balcony
hear him moving _____ from the door
Go along that street _____ the centre.
put those books _____ the top shelf
